headline: Digital Product Manager
summary: Passionate, value-driven product manager with experience leading cross-functional teams to, discover, plan, build, launch and manage great software innovations.

experiences.title: Digital Project Manager
experiences.description: FosterPower is an educational platform that helps educate Florida youth in foster care about their legal rights. Mobile application that provides vital information to foster youth in foster care, so they know their rights while in the state's custody. Having access to this information can change their trajectory – youth who often face insurmountable odds can now have the knowledge and resources they need to lead healthy, productive, independent lives.

experiences.title: Co-founder & Product Lead
experiences.description: FosterPower is a movement to improve the lives and futures for youth in foster care in Florida by creating access to information for youth in foster care on their benefits, protections, and legal rights. FosterPower is a program created and managed by Bay Area Legal Services.

experiences.title: Product Manager
experiences.description: Insurance broker and professional employer organization with a digital solution for managing and optimizing the daily human resources tasks and overall HR goals of an organization.

experiences.title: Project Manager
experiences.description: EveryMundo provides airlines with Fare Marketing technology for direct channel growth and customer acquisition. The products increase traffic, improve conversion rate, enhance user experience, and drive brand engagement on and off the airline’s website.

experiences.title: Co-Founder | Web Developer
experiences.description: Digital marketing & development agency with a focus on connecting multiple different artists around the world, advertising their brand, service, or work, using different marketing channels and technologies, connecting them to the consumers.

experiences.title: Web Developer |  Project Manager
experiences.description: Created eye-catching and user-friendly websites to generate web traffic and promote their clients' products and services.

experiences.title: IT Specialist
experiences.description: The largest hotel chain in the world by the number of available rooms. It has 30 brands with 7,000+ properties in 131 countries and territories, giving people more ways to connect, experience, and expand their world.
